basics.name: AbyssBorne Studios
basics.label: Welcome to the official website of AbyssBorne Studios!
basics.summary: Created by: Keita Grant, Nalani Klopfenstein, Jeric Quintans, Austin Jake Villanueva

about_us.name: We're a team of four student developers who created this pixel-art platformer as a class project. From concept to final build, we worked together to design, code, and polish a unique and challenging gameplay experience.
